Jobdesc.html:
I am working on one of the Primary software of Kronos named HRMS (Human Resource Management System). My Responsibilities mainly include adding new features to the System. This includes understanding the business requirement in depth, have discussions with the Product Manger to work out nitty-gritties of the feature.

It required me to study System flow, Data flow and Work Processes of the Software and finally transform all the information to Code.I make sure to use the best software practices into the code, improve software performance wherever possible while making sure to minimise regressions.

I keep myself updated with the state of the art development technologies and often share my knowledge across my team through technical sessions.I have conducted several sessions on various topics including JavaScript 2016 , NodeJS and Git/Github. I have also attended several on many different technologies including Angular, TypeScript, Cloud Computing and many others related to the Company Software.Its one of the best things about kronos that we hold regular technical training sessions which help us to keep ourselves updated to the new Technologies even though we might not be using them in day today life.
